title: Yi is f*cking retardedly broken.
body:
Please do something about this retardedly broken Champion.

Devourer's gives way too much clear speed to Melee AD's but is usually balanced however it eliminates Yi's weak early game and makes him incredibly difficult to punish or counter Jungle and he does insane amounts of damage come mid game to the point where you have to focus him and because of his Dashes and Meditate he is also very difficult to kill.

Like literally this Champion is a complete Joke right now, it happened as soon as you added Sated Devourer. Yi was already strong with Blade but it was let slide because other Champions were usually more played, now he is a jungle joke.
